summary: Monte Carlo is a special area in the country of Monaco. It's known for its big casino and fancy places like the HÃ´tel de Paris. The place has about 15,000 people living in it and is split into different parts. It's located along the French Riviera, near the mountains. Monte Carlo is one of Monaco's four main areas and is famous for showing off wealth. To the east, it borders the French town of Beausoleil, and not far away is the border of Italy.
title: Monte Carlo
